/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their red and orange facades standing out against the blue sky. These buildings are adorned with balconies and windows, adding architectural interest to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. In the distance, you can see trees and bushes, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of red, orange, and blue, creating a vibrant and lively atmosphere.
